original_text: When King Jehoiakim, his personal guards and all his officers heard what Uriah was saying, the king wanted to kill him. But Uriah heard about it and he was afraid. So he ran away to Egypt.
korean_text: 여호야김 왕과 그의 모든 용사와 모든 고관이 그의 말을 듣고서 왕이 그를 죽이려 하매 우리야가 그 말을 듣고 두려워 애굽으로 도망하여 간지라

sentences.original_text: When King Jehoiakim heard what Uriah was saying
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김 왕이 우리야가 말하는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: his personal guards heard it too
and all his officers heard it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 그의 관원들도 그것을 들었다

sentences.original_text: the king wanted to kill him
So he ran away to Egypt
